attributes.action: Erect a statue of John Hurt in his memory in his hometown of Chesterfield
attributes.background: This petition is to allow a statue of John Hurt to be erected in his hometown of Chesterfield, Derbyshire.

rejection.details:
This seems to be a decision for the local council to make, rather than the UK Government or Parliament.

Chesterfield Borough Council has its own e-petitions site:

https://www.chesterfield.gov.uk/your-council/your-chesterfield/community-engagement/epetitions.aspx

Alternatively, you can use the following link to find out who your local councillors are:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
